rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Vastu-compliant positioning for welcoming energy and a decorative archway in Art Deco style.
Expansive living room featuring geometric Art Deco patterns and an open-plan layout for communal interactions. Ample seating area with accent lighting and large windows offering garden views.
Formal dining area adjacent to the living space, integrated within the open floor plan with a built-in buffet or bar counter in Art Deco detailing.
Modern kitchen designed with sleek Art Deco finishes and efficient layout. Positioned as per Vastu guidelines to align with the southeast direction.
Well-designed bathroom ensuring privacy and functional space, integrating natural light without compromising seclusion.
Sufficient parking area for two vehicles with additional storage or utility space as per local building norms.
Fully equipped home theater with soundproofing and comfortable seating arranged in a semi-circular layout, offering immersive viewing experience.
Spacious master bedroom with a balcony providing garden views and designed in Art Deco aesthetics. Includes ample storage space and en-suite bathroom.
Secondary bedroom featuring a private balcony for relaxation and fresh air, complemented by Art Deco interior details.
Guest room with functional design and ample storage; integrates Vastu principles ensuring balanced energy flow.
Bathroom designed to serve both master and guest rooms with attention to privacy and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
